name: Hue Nguyen Thi
title: Manual Tester
summary: Enthusiastic and detail-oriented fresher manual tester with a strong foundation in software testing principles and methodologies. Passionate about ensuring software quality and user experience through thorough testing and bug identification.
about: I am a dedicated manual tester with a passion for quality assurance and software testing. My journey in tech began with a curiosity about how applications work and a desire to ensure they provide the best possible user experience. I believe that thorough testing is crucial for delivering reliable software that users can trust.
personalStory: My journey into tech wasn't a straight path. Growing up in Vietnam, I was always the person my family called when their phones or computers weren't working properly. I had this natural curiosity about how things worked and an eye for spotting when something wasn't quite right. When I moved to Tokyo for new opportunities, I discovered the world of software testing and realized it was the perfect blend of my analytical mind and my desire to help create better user experiences.

journey.title: The Beginning
journey.description: Started my journey in tech by taking online courses in software testing while working part-time jobs in Tokyo.

journey.title: First Steps
journey.description: Completed my first certification in manual testing and began practicing with real-world projects.

journey.title: Growing Confidence
journey.description: Joined testing communities and started contributing to open-source projects to gain experience.

journey.title: Professional Growth
journey.description: Landed my first professional testing role and discovered my passion for ensuring quality user experiences.

journey.title: Looking Forward
journey.description: Continuing to learn and grow while building this portfolio to share my journey with others.

hobbies.name: Photography
hobbies.description: Capturing the beauty of Tokyo's streets and the changing seasons. I love finding the perfect angle to tell a story through images.

hobbies.name: Cooking
hobbies.description: Experimenting with fusion recipes that blend Vietnamese flavors with Japanese ingredients. My friends are my willing taste testers!

hobbies.name: Reading
hobbies.description: Diving into mystery novels and tech blogs. There's something satisfying about solving puzzles, whether in books or in code.

hobbies.name: Hiking
hobbies.description: Exploring the mountains around Tokyo on weekends. Nature helps me clear my mind and think creatively about testing scenarios.

hobbies.name: Language Learning
hobbies.description: Improving my Japanese while helping others learn Vietnamese. Language exchange has become one of my favorite ways to meet new people.

travelExperiences.description: A weekend trip that reminded me why I fell in love with Japanese culture. The temples and traditional gardens were incredibly peaceful.
travelExperiences.highlight: Participated in a traditional tea ceremony

travelExperiences.description: Food paradise! Tried authentic takoyaki and okonomiyaki. The street food scene inspired my cooking experiments back home.
travelExperiences.highlight: Learned to make takoyaki from a local vendor

travelExperiences.description: My first solo hiking adventure in Japan. The waterfalls and shrines were breathtaking, and I gained confidence in exploring alone.
travelExperiences.highlight: Hiked to Kegon Falls and felt truly accomplished

items: Visit the cherry blossoms in Yoshino, Japan
Take a cooking class in Italy
Experience the Northern Lights in Iceland
Go back to Vietnam and show my Japanese friends my hometown
Contribute to a major open-source testing framework
Speak at a tech conference about testing methodologies
Mentor other newcomers to the tech industry
Start a testing blog to share knowledge
Master the art of Japanese calligraphy
Run a half marathon in Tokyo
Write a cookbook of Vietnamese-Japanese fusion recipes

funFacts: I can solve a Rubik's cube in under 2 minutes
I've never broken a bone despite being quite clumsy
I collect vintage postcards from places I visit
I can make 7 different types of Vietnamese pho
I once found a critical bug by accidentally spilling coffee on my keyboard
values: Empathy - Understanding users' perspectives and frustrations
Persistence - Never giving up when hunting down elusive bugs
Growth - Constantly learning and improving my skills
Community - Believing that we're stronger when we help each other

storyAlbum.title: Dreams Under Starlight
storyAlbum.note: Every starry night, I sit and dream about wonderful things to come. Dreams of becoming a speaker, traveling the world, and inspiring others. These dreams are like guiding stars, lighting the path ahead! ‚ú®üåô

storyAlbum.title: Celebrating Every Victory
storyAlbum.note: Every success, big or small, deserves celebration! From passing a difficult test case to completing a major project. I learned to cherish every moment of happiness and share joy with others! üéâüéÇ

storyAlbum.title: The Professional Today
storyAlbum.note: Look at me now! üéâ From a curious kid in Vietnam to a confident QA professional in Tokyo. Every test case I write, every bug I catch, every user experience I help improve - it all feels like I'm living my purpose. The journey continues! üí™‚ú®

storyAlbum.title: The Power of Friendship
storyAlbum.note: Friendship became the most precious gift I found in Tokyo. Friends from all over the world, sharing moments of joy and sorrow together. We grew up together, overcoming every challenge as one! üíïüë´

storyAlbum.title: Storms Make Us Stronger
storyAlbum.note: Life isn't always rosy. There were times I faced difficulties, failures, and wanted to quit. But every storm taught me valuable lessons. I learned that after rain comes sunshine, and I'm stronger than I thought! üåà‚õàÔ∏è

storyAlbum.title: The Learning Journey
storyAlbum.note: Late nights, countless tutorials, practice projects, and SO much coffee! ‚òï Learning to be a tester wasn't just about memorizing techniques - it was about developing an eye for detail and a passion for quality. Every bug I found felt like solving a mystery! üîçüìö

storyAlbum.title: First Glimpse of Tokyo
storyAlbum.note: WOW! Nothing could have prepared me for the energy of Tokyo. The neon lights, the bustling streets, the incredible technology everywhere - I felt like I was in an anime! This city would become my teacher, my challenge, and my home. üèôÔ∏èüí´

storyAlbum.title: The Great Journey
storyAlbum.note: The day I boarded that plane to Tokyo, my heart was racing with excitement and nervousness. I was leaving everything familiar behind to chase a dream I wasn't even sure about yet. But sometimes the best adventures start with a leap of faith! ‚úàÔ∏èüåü

storyAlbum.title: Childhood Dreams
storyAlbum.note: Growing up in the beautiful countryside of Vietnam, I was always the curious child who loved solving puzzles and helping others fix their problems. Little did I know this would lead me to my passion for testing! üåæ‚ú®

seo.meta_title: About Hue Nguyen Thi - My Journey as a Manual Tester in Tokyo
seo.meta_description: Discover my personal journey from Vietnam to Tokyo, my passion for quality assurance, love for photography and cooking, and dreams for the future. This is my story.
